thread.title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Announces the Commencement of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by Tarena International, Inc. and Certain Officers and Directors - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Announces the Commencement of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by Tarena International, Inc. and Certain Officers and Directors - Yahoo Finance

author: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP
title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Announces the Commencement of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by Tarena International, Inc. and Certain Officers and Directors - Yahoo Finance
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Levi & Korsinsky, LLP announces that it has commenced an investigation of Tarena International, Inc. (“Tarena International” or the “Company”) ( TEDU ) concerning possible violations of federal securities laws by the Company and/or certain of its officers and directors. 
On August 18, 2015, the Company announced that it had missed both EPS and earnings expectations for the second quarter fiscal 2015. Tarena International also lowered their future guidance, citing the RMB-USD exchange rate. On October 21, 2015, Seeking Alpha published an article on Tarena International reporting, among other issues, that: (1) Tarena International has a company-specific problem in collecting on tuition; (2) the inability of Tarena International’s students to access credit has caused the quality of the Tarena International’s financing partners to move from established banks to shadow banks; and (3) reviews by Tarena International students report allegedly deceptive practices and false promises. To obtain additional information about the investigation, go to : 
http://zlk.9nl.com/tarena-international-tedu 
or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at jlevi@zlk.com or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972. 
Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York, New Jersey, Connecticut and Washington D.C. The firm’s attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities and shareholder lawsuits. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes. 

View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151023005716/en/
